marklogic.body: What exactly is the "justice" they seek? Sounds like a lynch mob mentality to me. Where has their supposed outrage been when a person of color kills a white person? What is a "white hispanic"? Race baiters working overtime. I wonder what would be said if a white group put out a Bounty on someone of color? Instant outrage I'm sure. I also would like to know when has the justice department ever conducted an investigation when a white person is killed by a person of color? The answer is never. I also would like to know when Obama has ever spoke out when a white is killed by a person of color? He is suppose to be the President of us all but only speaks out when a person of color is involved and that usually means someone black. He authorized payments to those Afghans killed by a US soldier but has never asked for compensation for those 6 soldiers who were killed by the Afghans because of the Koran Burning. I wonder if color had anything to do with that?
